name: Darion Sexton
text: Super friendly and super helpful and really fast. Love this place

resp.text: Hey Darion!! We appreciate your kind words and thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing!!

name: Jay Jones
text: Great place to deliver. They put me right on a door and started unloading. I was only there a little over 30 minutes and they have inside restrooms that can be used.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jay! We love to read reviews like this!

name: Jagjot Singh Mann
text: Nice people...fast in nd out......washrooms for truck drivers available👍🏻👍🏻

resp.text: Thank you so much for this awesome review!!!

name: Sofía Uribe
text: One of the best warehouses we have delivered to.  We knew we were going to be late for the appointment so I called and talked to Misty. She was very kind and friendly and told us to try to not be later than certain time. Finally the driver got there and they unloaded him really fast. . Thank you for your great staff, and friendly response.

resp.text: Thank you for your awesome review and for letting us know about our Misty! She's an absolute gem!

name: lan Can
text:
Huge cross dock service in this area.
Easy in & out.

resp.text: Ian Can!! Thank you so much for your awesome review and kind words!!!

name: Joe Maddox
text: Great place to drop off. Fast in fast out. Friendly employees, and can somebody give Shawn some coffee. ☕ 😎 TGIF

resp.text: Thanks Joe!! We appreciate the awesome review! We will totally give Shawn some coffee! ha!

name: Tony Fichter
text: Our company is located 1500 miles from our customer in Anniston, Alabama.  We depend on Misty, Will, Cristi and the rest of the good people of BR Williams to receive, stock, pick and deliver our product accurately and timely.  They are all a joy to work with and the level of service they provide is second to none.  I highly recommend BR Williams for your logistics needs.

resp.text: Tony, what great words about our great people!! We appreciate this review!!!

name: Christine LaMar
text: Great company to work with! They always respond quickly to any questions we may have, and always willing to go the extra mile to provide us with the best service possible. One of the best public warehouses we work with!

resp.text: 5 Stars...THANK YOU!!! Christine, we appreciate you taking the time to give us this awesome review!

name: Jon Douglas
text: The service and support that our company gets from BR Williams is vital to our day to day business operations.  Without this service it would be very difficult to maintain the level of support we do with our customers along with the on time deliveries we provide.  BR Williams has truly been a blessing to our company and is integral in the growth we have experienced over the past several years.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jon!!! We love the awesome words!

name: Crystal Roberts
text: Our company has been using BR Williams services for several years.  The staff is super friendly and always willing to do whatever it takes to accommodate our needs in a very timely manner.

resp.text: Thank you so much William!!! Your review means so much to us!

Idek

name: Debra Smith
text: The Quickbooks product is excellent and we have received excellent service from Chris.  Chris has been a huge asset from purchase to install. We have multi-stores and his expertise in our field as been so beneficial. I would highly recommend Chris to anyone and anywhere in the county. Thanks for all your great support Chris.

resp.text: Debra, thank so much for the review!  We at Barons' love Chris too...great guy personally AND professionally!  SO glad you had a GREAT experience! Please let us know how we can serve you in the future!

name: Karen Sherman
text:
Barons' INC has helped me on my three businesses over the past five years. I feel they were indispensable when is came to setting up the books for one of the new ventures. Also,  I had my credit card machines purchased through them and they did a wonderful job with managing that for me.
These people are reliable, prompt, professional, and very informed.
I trust them.

resp.text: You're AWESOME Karen, NOT just our customer, but our friend! Always a pleasure to work with you! Thank you SO MUCH for the GREAT review!

text: I've had the honor and opportunity to know and work with Brandon Morris and the Barons' Inc team as their QuickBooks Channel Manager here at Intuit QuickBooks for over 5 years. name: Annie Stieler
text: The best of the best.

resp.text: Thanks for the GREAT review Annie! Truly appreciated!

name: Amy Michaels
text:
DO NOT ORDER FROM COTTAGE FARMS!!!
I received my order in late April, 2 plants were missing, half of the remaining ones were dead.  I called on 5/6/21 to notify them of the missing plants.  Another order was generated for those plants, I was told 2-3 weeks delivery. Fast forward to 6/7/21, called CF to check on the new order, was told it will ship soon. WHAT??? I called back the next day (6/8) since Customer Service never called me back when I asked to speak to someone.  I was told the order just shipped. Another 2-3 weeks delivery, now we're almost in July.  Who plants in July? CF will not work with me.  They never addressed the fact that half of my plants arrived dead. Southern hospitality, right!

name: Pamela Thompson
text: I bought a Knock Out Rose last spring. It arrived dead....nothing but a pile of dried dirt, empty pot and emaciated rose bush came out of the box. I tried calling immediately but was constantly put on hold. I called again last month and got through. They sent me a replacement that was 1/5 of the size pot the original plant came in and it too was dead. I emailed right away and their response was thanks for contacting us. Will not buy from Cottage Farms again. This is not the first dead plant(s) I have received over the years.

name: Patricia Shockey
text: Having problems with my replacement tree from company thru QVC. Probably not order online from Cottage Farm again. Customer service is nice but no tree.

name: J Swag
text: $60 for these 4, yes 4 plants via QVC. Would you walk into a nursery and drop $60 on this? 1st time and def the last time I deal with them. I reached out to CS and they obviously have a cut and paste response.

name: Carol Thomas
text: Ordered online 3 years ago.  Excellent!  My lilies are still blooming!

name: Kelly A. Hoffman-Pitt
text: I ordered 16 mini rose bushes from cottage farms via QVC.  The plants arrived in horrible shape.  Most looked dead.  QVC refunded my money and told me to toss the plants in the trash.  I won't ever order live plants from Cottage Farms again.

name: Sabrina Barnes
text: So I should have googled reviews first before buying.  Total disaster, shipped plants, lost plants, reship plants, plants turn out to be the FIRST PLANTS.  DEAD ON ARRIVAL.  AND no matter how many photos I sent if there was one green leaf..it was viable to them..NO REFUND.

name: Chris Krieger
text: Also enjoy my purchases. Healthy products.

name: Santiago Nieves
text: I order the live tiki party tropical hibiscus plant through Zulily.. The box that the plant came in looks like a car ran over it .damage open from both sides,ripped and the plant looks like it went through hell and back !!!!the leaves look dead..... very disappointing!!!UNACCEPTABLE!!!!Would not recommend it to anyone. I’m pretty sure it was Pack professionally but The way I received it was bad. When I received it I picked up the box and the plant went rolling down the stairs because the bottom  was opened.........VERRY BAD!!!!!

name: catarific sue
text: We ordered a desert rose which was intact upon delivery.  We replanted it and it is thriving.  Would reorder from this company again.

name: Lerone Wilson
text: I had a mini rose damaged in transit which died a week or two after arrival.  Beware of the Cottage Farms Direct's replacement policy.  If the item is nolonger in stock you have to wait an entire year for the replacement rather than just getting a refund.  Having replaced the item with one from another retailer rather than waiting for Cottage Farms Direct I can say with all honesty that you'll pay a little bit more elsewhere but it's very much worth it in terms of higher quality items/shipping and superior warranty/replacement plans.

resp.text: Ms. Wilson - Our replacement policy states that If for any reason you are dissatisfied or your plant does not perform as expected, we will replace it at no charge. Perennials are warranted for one-year and annuals, are warranted for ninety days from time of shipment.  Since your request for replacement came in after our shipping season ended, we advised that your replacement would ship the following season.   We are so sorry to hear that you are not satisfied and have canceled your replacement, however, we are still happy to replace the rose when your shipping zone opens this season.   Please let us know if we can be of further assistance.

name: patricia sheets
text: I ordered the sun patience from cottage farms via QVC. I ordered them at 2 different times about 3 weeks apart. The 1st two I ordered are barely making it after reaching maybe 3 inches in height. Then my 2nd ordered arrived which I ordered 6, I only have 2 living out of that 6 these came nowhere close to being as large and buetiful as they were shown to get on their shows, the 2 I have left are maybe 3" high by 4" wide.bi will never by them from them again. I babied these plants mainly because I put 4 of them at my mailbox at the road, they r pittiful

name: Brad Henderson
text: Joel was very helpful in supplying some nice sized azaleas that are hard to find in the Fort Walton Beach area. Beautiful plants.

name: Lynn Russell
text: When I first ordered from cottage farms through QVC,  they were the best plants money could buy and grew..for the most part as described on tv. For the past 2/3 years, however, the products have gone downhill considerably!! The sunpatiens I received this year weren't nearly the quality as in the past! They were so tiny that i couldnt even plant them until they grew! Some ive still not planted. Needless to say, I'll NEVER order again! Also their logo about customer being satisfied...well.. I had perennials that didn't come back. It took couple of tries calling and finally yesterday my plants arrived. They were slimy and yellow. Only time will tell if they will grow! Now..I'll  have to say customer service was always attentive and courteous. I'll  not be ordering from this company again!

name: The Monroe Family
text: Everything is really nice

name: N S
text: Excellent work, exactly what I wanted. Thank you!

name: Jason Elmer
text: Web Detail has been great to work with. Being a small business, I did not have the budget for a full-scale website. Jerimy and his team were there to listen to my specific needs and helped develop something that was just what I was needing for right now that can be built upon. From start to finish the process was very quick.

text: WebDetail has done a fantastic job designing our website!  Jerimy and his team are very responsive if we need to make changes and outstanding to work with! We are very happy clients of WebDetail!

Sean

text: Complete rebranding of my business - Irons Distillery - was done by WebDetail.  After having a attic webpage for over 4 years, it was time for a total makeover of my website. Check it out at ironsone.com - excellent work!!

I'm not that computer savvy so it's nice to have someone to count on.

Trust Jerimy with your digital design needs.  We do!

text: WebDetail designed and developed a website for our local chapter of an international non-profit organization and the results were exactly what we wanted. When the website was ready to go, he trained several of us on how to make edits on our own so we don't have to bother him all the time.  The way the website was developed makes it very simple and easy for us to edit and add data.  We highly recommend WebDetail for any web development or modifications you need.
